markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arachnid Harness](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1839)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_ has four knobbed ribs that wrap around the torso. The armor grants you resistance 2 to poison damage.

<document level="2" id="action-1532" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Arachnid Harness
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include four intact legs from an [ogre spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=814).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Arachnid Harness (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The armor is _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) leather armor_, the resistance is 5, and the harness can be activated once every 10 minutes.

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include four intact legs from a [goliath spider](/Monsters.aspx?ID=388).
name: Arachnid Harness
